name: Bug Fight
description:
You play as one of the two bugs. The goal is, to push the other one out of the playfield by honking at each other. 

Only local multiplayer (no AI, you need to people to play the game properly)

The game is made to be played with a controller, but you can use a keyboard ("START" = ESC; "Player1 Movement" = WASD; "Player1 Honk" = SPACE; "Player2 Movement" = Arrow Keys; "Player2 Honk" = Numpad 0 or Right CTRL)
